resources.string: This application requires battery optimization to be disabled (Don\'t Optimise) to function correctly.
When active, WallaGram will periodically update your selected wallpaper
Allows you to set how often WallaGram searches for a new wallpaper
Allows you to set which wallpaper WallaGram updates\n(Home Screen / Lock Screen)
Allows you to place a priority on which image in a multi-image post is selected for your new wallpaper
When active, WallaGram saves new posts into an album in your gallery
As posts do not have a uniform size, WallaGram needs to crop each post to fit your screen. Image Align allows you to set a preference for the positioning
Allows you to clear all accounts from the\nRecent Searches List
